SELECT q.id as quest_id, q.type, qc.subtitle as category, q.title, q.difficulty, q.xp, q.is_seasonal, q.season_start, q.season_end, q.status, q.created_at, q.description, COALESCE(qu_progress.count_in_progress, 0) as count_in_progress, COALESCE(qu_completed.count_completed, 0) as count_completed FROM badge_quest bq JOIN quest q ON bq.quest_id = q.id LEFT JOIN quest_category qc ON q.category = qc.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT quest_id, COUNT(*) as count_in_progress FROM quest_user WHERE status = 'IN_PROGRESS' GROUP BY quest_id ) qu_progress ON q.id = qu_progress.quest_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT quest_id, COUNT(*) as count_completed FROM quest_user WHERE status = 'COMPLETED' GROUP BY quest_id ) qu_completed ON q.id = qu_completed.quest_id WHERE bq.badge_id = #{badge_id} ORDER BY q.id ASC
SELECT bu.user_id, u.nickname, u.profile_image, bu.awarded_at FROM badge_user bu JOIN user u ON bu.user_id = u.user_id WHERE bu.badge_id = #{badge_id} ORDER BY bu.awarded_at DESC
